entry.summary:
Observed at: Campbell River Airport 4:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
Temperature: 7.4°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.4°C
Wind: SE 29 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 6:27 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 15 mm except 35 mm over southern sections. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:27 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 6:27 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
